image_prompt: A hyper-realistic, wide-angle shot inside a modern, clean manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of three maintenance technicians (one female, two male) are gathered around a large industrial pump. They are wearing full PPE including hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. The female technician is holding a ruggedized tablet, showing the back of the device to the camera (screen hidden), while pointing at a specific component on the pump. The other two are looking attentively at the area she is indicating. The background shows a busy but organized factory floor with yellow safety walkways and blurred machinery.
